    Designated Ride

    Created Using:

    • Java
    • Android Studio
    • Firebase
    • GeoFire

    Designated Ride Android application provides a transportation service to patients and users that need to attend their medical and healthcare appointments. The costs of the service are covered by the user’s health insurance.

    View interactive prototype on InVision.

    Video demonstration of prototype

    Designated Ride Images

    A few images of the Designated Ride Android application.

    Checkers AI

    Created Using:

    • C++
    • Microsoft Visual Studio

    This checkers program was designed to play against a human opponent after machine learning the game of checkers. Using the algorithms least mean square, alpha beta pruning, linear heuristics, and mini-max.

    The checkers program begins by playing itself n amount of time. Refining the evaluation of what it gives to a given checkers board state and machine learning the game of checkers. After n games have been played the program will use what it has learned to play against a human opponent.

    Checkers AI Images

    This is part of the output of the checkers ai program. The images represent a single move as the computer plays against itself. The image on the left represents the current board state. The image on the right shows the move the computer made and a score representing the evaluation of the board state after the move. A positive or negative evaluation represents if either white or black has a better position.

    Information Discord Bot

    Using:

    • JavaScript
    • Node.js
    • Discord
    • Visual Studio 2019

    Information discord bot uses various API’s to display various information when given a command. With possible updates in the future for more commands.

    Github Repository

    Information Discord Bot Images

    !anime:

    Displays information about given anime.

    !catfact:

    Displays a random cat fact.

    !covid:

    Display information regarding covid-19.

    !help:

    Displays all possible commands

    !magic:

    Displays information about given magic the gathering card.

    !show:

    Displays information about given TV show.

    !stock:

    Displays information about given stock.

    !weather:

    Displays two day forecast from given location.

    Saturday Night Limited Standings Extension

    Created Using:

    • JavaScript
    • Node.js
    • Smash.gg API
    • Twitch API
    • Visual Studio 2019

    Saturday Night Limited Standings displays the standings of participants in a limited, best of three, swiss style tournament. Viewers will be able to see the top ranking participants of the tournament. Displaying the user name and total score for the rounds. If the participant attaches their twitch handle to the tournament standings their user name will be in the form of a link. If a viewer is interested in the participant they can use that link which will opening a new page in the browser to that participants twitch page.

    Video demonstration of version 0.0.1

    Saturday Night Limited Standings Extension Image

    Image of desktop version 0.0.2

    Image of desktop version 0.0.3

    Image on android version 0.0.3

    Image on android version 0.0.3

    GitHub Repository

    Twitch Extension Page

    Spam Filter

    Created Using:

    • Java
    • Eclipse

    This spam filter program was designed to determine whether a given set of text was considered spam or not spam using naive bayes algorithm.

    The spam filter program requires a set of sample cases of text that are already classified as spam and not spam. When given any new set of text it can then determine whether it’s spam or not and further refine its ability to correctly classify text.

    Spam Filter Image

    This is an output file of the spam filter. Given a set of youtube comments to analyze it outputs a text file. The text file contains an evaluation of Spam or Not Spam next to the comment and the probability of a given word in the comment being spam.

    Tab Extension

    Creating Using:

    • JavaScript
    • HTML
    • Visual Studio Code

    Extension for firefox to add useful things for tabs in context menu.

    Github Repository

    Tab Extension Images

    Move:

    Gives the user the ability to move tabs to the left or right into a new window.

    Print:

    Gives the user the ability to print and print preview the current tab. These feature exist within the menu bar of firefox but, if you have the menu bar disabled then you would be forced to use hotkeys.

    Sort:

    Gives the user the ability to sort tabs by title, url or last accessed in ascending or descending order.

    PDF:

    Gives the user the ability to save the current tab as a pdf.

    Close:

    Gives the user the ability to close all tabs to the left, right, other or close duplicate tabs.

    Discard:

    Gives the user the ability to discard tabs. This allows the user to free up memory and help speed up firefox.

    Combine:

    Gives the user the ability to combine tabs. This places all the urls into one html page to help free up memory.

    Options:

    Customizable options menu allows the user to choose what features they want to be displayed in the browser, tab and page context menus.

    Previous Tabs:

    Gives the user the ability to see up to 25 previously closed tabs and restore them if need. This features exists within the menu of firefox but, if you have the menu bar disabled then you can’t view it. The extension does allow all tabs to be restored into a new window which is not avaliable from the menu bar.
